name: Slip Tint Dewy Tinted Moisturizer
about: What it is: A multiuse tinted moisturizer that delivers skin-loving hydration and sheer, dewy coverage in confusion-free shades...Coverage: Light..Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts water and retains moisture in skin..- Licorice Root Extract: Visibly brightens skin..- Pansy Flower: A potent antioxidant that fights free-radical damage and works with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This sheer tinted moisturizer seamlessly blends into a wide range of skin tones for a hydrated, your-skin-but-better finish...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts water and retains moisture in skin..-Licorice Root Extract: Visibly brightens skin..-Pansy Flower: A potent antioxidant that fights free-radical damage and works with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture..Water, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Zinc Oxide (15%), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, C15-19 Alkane, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Jojoba Esters, Tribehenin, Beeswax, Glyceryl Stearate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Glycerin, Lactobacillus, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Viola Tricolor Extract, Bisabolol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Mica......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply one to two pumps with your fingertipsu2014no shaking required..-Blend..-Feel free to apply Saie Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy Highlighter (sold separately) before or after for enhanced glow..-Use daily...Recycling Instructions:.-Tube is made of 100 percent sugarcane bio-resin..-Saie chose to use plastic made from ethanol, a carbon-neutral and renewable derivative of the Brazilian sugarcane plant..-Once empty, twist off the pump (not yet recyclable)..-Trim the end of the tube and clean it out before placing in your recycling bin..-All of Saieu2019s secondary cartons are made from 100 percent post-consumer waste and FSC-certified paper; simply toss into your recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like many other reviews, the first few times I used this product I found it super greasy and shiny - so much so that I had to set with powder TWICE. I didn't follow the product instructions, and used a brush/beauty blender to apply it for the first few times. The product instructions actually state that you need to apply with your fingers as you would a moisturizer or primer. This completely changed the way I feel about the product, and didn't look greasy at all using this application method. I didn't even have to set it. I will say this is exactly what it's called - a slip tint. It's not pigmented and if you're looking for a product that has more coverage than say a tinted sunscreen, this is not the product for you. I like this for lighter days, and it wears really well with sunscreen, some concealer and blush.

Unfortunately, the product doesn't play well with other products (not even my Saie hydrabeam concealer, which the company recommends to use together) -- likely because of the oil it contains?  More importantly, though, this product proved to be severely drying for my sensitive skin after a week of daily use, even after prepping my skin with my usual daily moisturizer beforehand. It made my skin very dry and flaky -- especially around my eyes. I assume this is because of the zinc oxide. The issue disappeared several days after I discontinued use.  I still love the Saie blushes and foundation, but this one is a hard pass for me.

If you want full coverage move on. If you have mature skin you don't want a thick foundation, you want this. Never ever settles into skin. This I consider a Holy Grail product!

reviews.review_title: Might as well smear coconut oil on your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The first pump of this was just pure oil which should have been my first indication that it was not going to be good. I tried shaking it a little bit followed by a few more pumps and it seemed to mix but when I actually applied it, it felt like I was smearing coconut oil on my face. Immediately took it off because I knew it would not feel good on my skin. Also the display in store said SPF 45 and zinc oxide is a high listed ingredient but it's not labeled as such on the bottle or box so beware...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great colour match but too Dewey looking!!  Not good for oily skin, or even combination.  Too much shine that needs a lot of powder to matify.

reviews.review_title: Skip this if you have big pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this. My skin looked so nice and natural after finishing my whole routine (bronzer blush on top etc) but after a few wears I realized it wasnu2019t working for my skin. I would wake up with enlarged pores after wearing it. As other said, I agree it applies thick but that didnu2019t bother me b/c I have dry skin and it does have a strong smell but you donu2019t notice that after 5 mins. If you have great skin to begin with and are on the dry side then you may love this. Overall I love this clean brand and Iu2019m sad it didnu2019t work out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Moves around a lot and is really hard to set. The container is awful, stopped being able to pump before I was even halfway through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been searching for a good tinted moisturizer. First, let me say this color match did not work. For a fair skinned girl, this always looked like I had done a spray tan. I really wanted it to work because I loved the texture and the finish, so I tried really hard to make it work. But the true dealbreaker was the smell. I never mind a product that has a nice perfume, even if I prefer fragrance-free. But I COULD NOT STOMACH THIS. It smells like play dough gone bad, and the smell last for hours. Had to return to Sephora.

reviews.review_title: No more coverage than a mineral sunscreen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love clean beauty but I didnu2019t like this. Itu2019s a weird texture and didnu2019t really do much as a tinted moisturizer in my opinion. I would rather just wear my mineral sunscreen which has more SPF protection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy it, i feel like it gives a clean natural glowy look. however i did notice right away the smell is really weird. and i could smell it on my face for like 15 minutes but after that it went away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product as the reviews seemed great and I have used some Saie products before. Now, it was still a decent tinted moisturizer but compared to the Nars or Fenty one this one is below par. I found the consistency to be super thick and the smell really threw me off. It definitely provides a 'dewy' look but for me I felt i just looked oily and that I had too much on my face, it does not spread well and I feel I have to use a decent amount. Lastly, my pump did not work properly and I would have to squeeze the tube to get some to come out and of course it would shoot out and make a mess everywhere. One positive thing is I did find that it did settle and lasted decently throughout the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Two - for very light skintones with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i can't believe more people aren't talking about this product! light coverage, goes on so nicely with just your fingers and blends super easily. makes your skin look so glowy literally all day. i'm obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm just recently trying to get back into the makeup game after reducing it significantly the past 7 years. I love the natural highlighted look so opted for this. Basically somethjbg that looks like my skin but is better, and this fits it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this product, it is definitely sheer but for a quick hydrating tinted pick me up for your skin when your in a rush and some bronzer and blush, Its gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When i first pumped it the product came out very oily with separation, but all it took was a good shake and it came out normally. I wasn't sure if this would fit for me because i have more oily skin myself, but i've been consistently using it for a few months at this point and I actually really like it. It has a more sheer coverage but still evens out my skin tone, and has a glowy finish to it.  It doesn't make me that oily either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizes nicely. The shine settles down after a short while and looks natural. Good moisturizer for dry, cooler season. BUT, I bought it because I thought it was SPF 35. It is NOT (in Canada). Buyer beware. If you're looking at US reviews, it is misleading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's too greasy for me. It does even out my complexion and gets rid of some redness, but it feels heavy. Not worth it for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a decent skin tint. Offers much more coverage than normal skin tints. However it makes you look like a greaseball and feels heavy on the skin. Works for some people and not for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Meh, itu2019s okay. Itu2019s pretty greasy but my dry skin looooves it. the coverage is definitely sheer but it does give you a glow. I donu2019t really reach for it.. Thought it had SPF when I purchased but i guess they removed it?  Tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, glowy foundation with light coverage. Does not break me out and blends nicely with other products. I would give it a try if you have drier skin and are looking for a natural, dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a few weeks now. Itu2019s a nice consistency, easy to apply, spreadable and gives a pretty nice healthy look to the skin. One thing I will say is it has a slight smell that I donu2019t really like. I like the pump for ease of application. Bonus is it has spf. I will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Am I missing something?? I doesnu2019t do anything for me except make my skin sticky, and it does smell like clay or something. I donu2019t hate the smell, but I donu2019t like it either. Iu2019ll use it a bit more to see what itu2019s supposed to do, but Iu2019ll probably give it away. Sad, because I wanted to like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. It goes on smooth, looks super natural and I just use a concealer for more coverage on some red marks on my skin and I'm ready to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i found it really oily on my skin and it separated so bad! ended up giving it away because i didnu2019t like it at all :(

reviews.review_title: Sticky, greasy, and not enough color options
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Again I am having an issue with Sephora. Every time when I go to get a tinted moisturizer or foundation they choose the wrong color. It feels sticky and greasy. This product was recommended by one of the Sephora employees, also who chose my color. Disaster. Waste of money.

reviews.review_title: Finally found it in my shade 01.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

Bit of a funny smell but I donu2019t notice it after applying. I like it overall!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Two - for very light skintones with peach undertones

Iu2019ve tried using a little but less or setting it with a powder but, I just canu2019t seem to get this product to lay on my skin nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three - for light to medium skintones with peach undertones

reviews.review_text: Really love this, applies nicely and stays on. Leaves a dewy glow which i personally donu2019t love, but apply powder to matte it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin and like the glowy/dewy look this is perfect. Iu2019ve given up on foundation, it settles into my face weird and makes me look old. I love this tinted moisturizer I use a little setting powder to take away the shine where I donu2019t want it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is okay, I find it almost has a different finish everytime I use it ?

reviews.review_text: really nice tint!! the saie website says it contains spf but i donu2019t think this one does. also havenu2019t seen ppl mention it but when you first open it, oil comes out but after a few pumps it is perfect !! i have combo skin and didnu2019t find this too oily or too drying. also should mention there is a bit of a smell but it goes away after a while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. Its light coverage so it is perfect for make up no make up kinda look. The only problem that i faced with this product is the strong fragrance in the tint but it disappears when u apply it in to ur skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three + Half - for light to medium skintones with golden undertones

reviews.review_text: I had to return it because it had a really weird smell in my opinion. I also didnu2019t like how it felt on my skin and the way it held other products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very light coverage. Blends well with fingers and has a natural glowy-ish finish. I have oily sensitive acne-prone skin and I prefer this dewy finish instead of matte because it doesn't make bring out my textured skin. Also, I get a few dry patches with healing acne spots and this being a moisturizer helps with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: perfect light coverage skin tint! i use my fingers to apply after using the saie glowy super gel. i have dry skin and it blends in nicely and hasn't pilled for me. shade one is a good match, although i would like to see neutral shades added as well. i love how it makes my skin look dewy and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The way this melts into your skin. Makes my skin feel soft and dewy but keeps the oil to a minimum. My skin looks better throughout the day. My blush, and bronzer (rare beauty cream products) blend so flawlessly over this. I have dry skin and it does not cling to dry patches, and actually filters my skin. Light coverage but slightly buildable. No scent and no breakouts caused.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is beautiful. I have combo skin and a big lover of the MAC Face and Body foundation (original) for the makeup/no makeup look or very natural look. I was looking for something new to try and came across this product and I am in LOVE. It does not make you oily or too dry, it is the perfect finish as it literally looks and feels like your skin. Also, I have purchased the liquido u201chighlighteru201d (forgot the actual name) and together u2026 WOW, even more perfect and still not making you look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This s has an expired product smell .. even though the product is fine but canu2019t apply bcoz of the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My Skin type: - Combination skin (dry patches on skin here and there, oily on some parts)  - Acne prone  -Some hyperpigmentation   Pros and Method:  Since using retinol, my skin has been improving and I have less texture, acne and hyperpigmentation so instead of buying a foundation I opted for this and I donu2019t regret it. Itu2019s clean beauty which I prefer and the packaging is great instead of a glass bottle.   I apply the Cerave spf 30 moisturizer and then the Saie Slip Tint Dewy Moisturizer and the combination is great. Doesnu2019t make my skin look oily at all. I look dewy and hydrated. The way I describe it is a tinted beautiful skin veil. It makes you have you have the u2018clean makeup looku2019 as you see on social media. It lets your skin shine through so you can still see some hyperpigmentation but it looks better, healthy.   Cons:  - Itu2019s expensive for the amount and the type of plastic packaging too so thatu2019s why I took 1 star off.   Would I purchase again? :  Although I do wish it was a couple dollars less I would purchase again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three - for light to medium skintones with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I have oily skin and this is perfect for a light hydrating finish. I use a lot of skincare prior and it never pills. I am definitely getting a darker shade for the summer though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not at all dewy, it pills as well with your skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, oily t-zone with some dehydrated areas after 14hrs at the office. I wanted something that would even out my skin while looking natural and glowy. I didnu2019t want a lot of coverage because I can always spot conceal. This tinted moisturizer does everything it claims and more. Iu2019ve only gotten compliments when wearing it, and it never oxidized on me (oxidation mostly takes place whenever a product doesnu2019t mix well with your skincare). If you want something that looks like your skin but truly better, hydrated, taken care of, and gets to breathe through, this is it. I like to apply it in the morning after my skincare with my makeup routine, and on its own to freshen up after the gym/yoga. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Two - for very light skintones with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it when first applied it was dewy and pretty, light coverage. But after an hour or so looked dry on my dry skin.  And the smell! The smell (like clay as I saw someone else say is pretty accurate description)would not go away, gave me a headache. Two stars because looks dewy for first hour maybe on me

reviews.review_title: Save Yourself the Trouble of Returning It
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this tinted moisturizer along with a bunch of others because I wanted to compare them and see which one would be the best for my combination skin as the warmer weather approaches. Safe to say, this one didn't even come close to some of the others; it is too dewy (which is something I never thought I would say since my motto has always been the more glowy the better), does not set well, clings to any dry patches and makes oily spots appear greasy, oxidizes throughout the day, and emphasizes pores so badly. I wasn't looking for something heavy and full coverage like a foundation, but I did want it to look good under makeup and not emphasize any red spots or blemishes I might have, and this just missed the mark completely. If you're looking for something truly amazing and lightweight that will not have the same problems, invest in the Rose Inc skin tint or the Nars tinted moisturizer, since those are leagues better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's very oily if it's not well shaken before use. If i fail to shake it well, I may need to remove it from my face due to excessive oiliness! However, i like its effect on my skin if i managed to shake it right. The colour blends well in the skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three - for light to medium skintones with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color was great and the feel was okay too but it ended up breaking me out. I got a bunch of small pimples around my chin and nose. It also clung to some dry patches even with skin prep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tinted moisturizer for every day use! It is very natural looking on the skin. I have oily skin so I have to set it (as I set every base product) but itu2019s my favourite every day product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a gamble and ordered online hoping to get a good colour match and I seem to have gotten lucky - the photos and shade direction/comparison is super helpful and makes ordering easy. The product blends well and goes on super light, I love when I can't feel the makeup on my skin. Tried this once and immediately loved the way it made my skin look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Itu2019s a beautiful clean beauty skin tint from such a good brand and I truly love it. This is NOT a foundation but more of a skin tint/glowy dewy skin enhancer product. If this is what you are also looking for, itu2019s perfect ! I think the bad reviews are mostly based on wrong expectations because if you know what you are getting, it does not disappoint. Definitely my go to for the summer !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and spreadability of this product, and the colour was a perfect match. It's very light coverage, which is exactly what I was looking for. However, the tinted moisturizer pills terribly and the scent is quite strong. The pilling was a deal breaker for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three + Half - for light to medium skintones with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Thatu2019s why I canu2019t give it 5 stars. It performs well but the scentu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

It evens out redness and skin tone just enough for a natural looking glow.  Feels great on the skin and a little product goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a product exactly like this for YEARS! and the fact that it is a clean beauty product is just a bonus! it glides on glowy and smooth but sets nicely so you don't look slick (I'm combo skin and love the glow but don't want toooo glowy that it looks oily). But doesn't set too much. It's literally perfection. So far I'm in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I use a light dusting of mineral face powder over top and it lasts all day and actually looks like my skin, not a crusty foundation.  Excited to try more Saie products!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three + Half - for light to medium skintones with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Unfortunately after having these for just about 3 months both tubes have gone rancid and are unusable. I cannot justify for the cost given the shelf life of this product.

reviews.review_title: Sheer and Dewy, know what you're getting!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is sooooo pretty. I will always have someone comment on how amazing my skin looks when I have this on. It truly looks like SKIN. If you're a fan of face+body products and tinted Moisturizers in general you will probably like this.

reviews.review_title: Great product for a natural, dewy look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product. I've never worn foundation or a tinted moisturizer before but decided to try this because it had an SPF and was recommended to me for dewy, glowing skin. It absolutely delivered and I will now forever be using this tinted moisturizer. It evens out my skin so well and eliminates all redness while being sheer and natural looking. The color matches perfectly and it just melts into my skin.  I will say that I have relatively dry skin and still have to use a moisturizer underneath this. So I don't find it greasy at all - it feels light on my face and leaves me with a healthy glow all day - but I could see it not working for someone with skin that's already oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE!!! Everyone needs this! I watched videos of this before I got it and I was nervous cuz it looks super dewy on people, and they said itu2019s super sheer.. it wasnu2019t like that for me, I have normal skin I found it to be normal not wet looking, I only need a little bit and I found it looked like I have full coverage on, but I donu2019t have acne I do have redness to my skin and it covered! Great product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for a quick makeup look. Definitely is light coverage but perfect for those days where you want to look put together but donu2019t necessarily want a lot of makeup on.

I have combination skin and most foundations / skin tints get a little oily as the day wears on. With this Saie slip tint I only blot once mid day and my skin is perfect until I wash it off. This is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really broke my skin out. Otherwise it's okay. This shade is definitely more yellow undertones. Very sheer coverage.   I actually didn't find it too oily. But I returned it because it broke me out.

It has sheer coverage but it does decrease the redness overall, it's easy to apply and feels hydrating on the skin But there are a few downfalls, I love that there's a mineral UV protection in it, but it creates a very oily/greasy look! Second, not sure if it was a defective pump I got, but it stopped pumping product out after 3 uses; but atleast you can unscrew the top off and use it that way. Third, the product seems to melt off my skin after a couple hours, even with setting it in different way..  I do think if there was no mineral protection in this, it would be a better off tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this as I love their dewy highlighter and itu2019s hard to find a tinted moisturizer that doesnu2019t have any dimethicone in it but this wasnu2019t great. Not dewy. Weird consistency and generally just didnu2019t like it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three + Half - for light to medium skintones with golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

I also lean towards dry, so the oiliness doesn't bother me - if anything, I'll bounce a beauty blender over some areas after application just to help remove some of the shine. But it won't cover true discolouration, blemishes or dark circles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Three - for light to medium skintones with peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Even as someone with normal to dry skin that usually enjoys a VERY dewy finish, this felt like a complete oil slick going on the face. To top it off, shade One is not especially fair; as someone with ~NC10 skin this was visibly a shade darker than my face. I rarely return items, but a product that's less than ideal in both formula and color really needs to go.

reviews.review_text: The tint is there, but the coverage is less than light. Not what I expected. I like the dewy finish. The product starts breaking apart within a couple hours. At the end of the day it was like I had never applied anything.

reviews.review_text: Really not enjoying it so far. Minimal coverage while being pretty greasy. Similar feel as the Nars tinted moisturizer, only less coverage. My biggest concern with this is transfer, having it get all over my mask and then bunch up where my mask was.
